name: Choose your dice
description: You’re at the casino and you play against your nemesis. You have 3 dices with you : a 6 sided dice, a 10 sided dice and a 20 sided dice. Your goal is to won the game against him (you can see health bars under you and him). One particular thing is that your enemy has weaknesses. Those numbers are indicated above him (there’s 5 each turn, 3 repetitive pattern and the numbers are in an ascending order) and are yours to be discovered during the game. Each dice makes a certain number of damages : The 20’s makes the number indicated on it, the 10’s makes the same but x2 and the 6’s x3. If your dice makes a « weakness number » then the number indicated on it makes x2 damages. It’s yours to decide which dice to use each turn and what will makes the most damages. Choose wisely. Your dice is your only weapon. And above everything...Have Fun !
